name: James Wright
backstory: He's charming, thoughtful, affectionate and perhaps a little too jealous. But this is all just a facade, a mechanism to deal with his position. He was born in a small family in an average village. He lived free of trouble until he was about 10 years old, but at that point life began to change.

name: Emily Watson
backstory: She's reliable, thoughtful, witty and perhaps a little too foolish. But there's more than meets the eye, not surprising for somebody with her position. She was born in a middle class family in an average port. She lived in peace until she was about 17 years old, but at that point things changed.
